com.mathgame.math
Class Items

java.lang.Object
  com.mathgame.math.Items
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.util.EventListener
public class Items
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ItemListener

Adapter class which is used as an item listener. It listens for the state of components being changed, such as checkboxes being clicked.
